title: Remove bill section from balance sheet display

requirements.text: Remove the bill-related section from the balance sheet view while preserving all other daily totals and item quantity displays

quotes: delete that bill part in the sheet bill and leave the rest of the sheet

acceptanceCriteria: The bill section is no longer visible in the balance sheet view
Daily revenue totals continue to display correctly
Item quantities remain visible and functional
Clear-all functionality continues to work for remaining data

constraints: Do not modify backend data structures or storage
Preserve all existing balance sheet functionality except the bill display section
nonGoals: Modifying the calculator or print bill views
Changing how bills are saved or stored
Altering the daily totals calculation logic
